front.title: Extending the Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for TRILL campus

abstract.t: TRILL can be implemented in data center, which is request high reliability and stable, but if RBridge breaks down, the switch time is up to IS-IS topology convergence time. This is not satisfied to the data center service. VRRP provides a redundancy mechanism to avoid single point of failure and fast switching over. This draft proposes to extend VRRP protocol to TRILL in data center.
